<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The dns_nameservers resource allows you to configure DNS nameservers for your Tailscale network. See the
[Tailscale DNS documentation](https://tailscale.com/kb/1054/dns) for more information.


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Tailscale = Pulumi.Tailscale;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var sampleNameservers = new Tailscale.DnsNameservers("sampleNameservers", new Tailscale.DnsNameserversArgs
        {
            Nameservers = 
            {
                "8.8.8.8",
                "8.8.4.4",
            },
        });
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-tailscale/sdk/go/tailscale"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := tailscale.NewDnsNameservers(ctx, "sampleNameservers", &tailscale.DnsNameserversArgs{
			Nameservers: pulumi.StringArray{
				pulumi.String("8.8.8.8"),
				pulumi.String("8.8.4.4"),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_tailscale as tailscale

sample_nameservers = tailscale.DnsNameservers("sampleNameservers", nameservers=[
    "8.8.8.8",
    "8.8.4.4",
])
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as tailscale from "@pulumi/tailscale";

const sampleNameservers = new tailscale.DnsNameservers("sample_nameservers", {
    nameservers: [
        "8.8.8.8",
        "8.8.4.4",
    ],
});
```


{{< /example >}}

### Inputs

The DnsNameservers resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
